title: The Kings Majesties letter, directed to the Committee of Estates of his Kingdome of Scotland. And his Majesties proclamation for disbanding of all forces within this Kingdom raised by his authority, and not allowed by Parliament, Secret Councell, or Committee of Estates.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,
